hero.name: Steven Ortega
hero.desc: Full Stack Developer passionate about Artificial Intelligence and technology.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.p1: Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and the skills I‚Äôve developed over time while working with modern technologies and real-world projects.
about.subtitle: Get to know me!
about.txt1: I'm a Software Engineer passionate about Web and Backend Development, building modern, efficient, and scalable solutions.
about.txt2: I'm also deeply interested in Cybersecurity and AI-powered Automation, combining these fields to create smarter, safer, high-performance systems.
about.txt3: I enjoy learning and sharing knowledge with the developer community, contributing with experience, best practices, and real-world projects.
about.hobbiesText: Beyond my passion for technology, I enjoy new experiences outside of coding. I love traveling, discovering cultures, playing soccer and volleyball, riding my motorcycle, and enjoying games and movies.

projects.title: PROJECTS
projects.desc: Here you will find some of my personal and client projects, each one with its own case study and detailed explanation.
projects.pharmazync_desc: An AI-powered pharmaceutical chatbot created in n8n. It processes medication queries, stock validation, interactions, recommendations, and escalation to human staff.
projects.clock_desc: An advanced Python clock managing multiple time zones, automatic conversions, custom formats, and utilities.
projects.centers_desc: Netflix-style JavaScript platform with smooth navigation, dynamic catalog, and modern UI.

testimonials.title: TESTIMONIALS
testimonials.desc: Here you will find testimonials from collaborators and clients sharing their experiences working with me.
testimonials.v1_text: Working with Steven was a great experience. He communicates clearly, solves problems efficiently, and always seeks the best technical approach.
testimonials.v2_text: Steven is a strong engineer, skilled in frontend and backend, and always optimizing systems. Working with him was smooth and productive.
testimonials.v3_text: Steven stands out for his responsibility, quick learning, and teamwork. He is proactive, creative, and highly skilled with development tools.

experience.title: EXPERIENCE
experience.desc: Here is a summary of my professional experience and projects that have shaped my development path.
experience.exp1_desc: Automation system for a 360 travel and tourism agency.
experience.exp3_desc: Software engineering student contributing to research projects.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.desc: Feel free to contact me using the form below. I‚Äôll get back to you soon.
